concept.title: Capture screenshot and create screenshot property of an object

conbody.p: The ingredients required for the image-based object location to work include:

ul.li: Target screenshots of a web element
The screenshot property of that element

conbody.p: There are two ways to create the required ingredients:

li.xref: Using the built-in feature in Web Recorder and Spy

conbody.p: In Tests Explorer, under the Screenshots folder, you can see the Matched Elements and Targets folders.

ul.li: The Matched Elements folder contains objects that are located by Katalon Studio based on the target images.
The Targets folder is for containing the images that Katalon Studio uses for locating objects.
For a sample project, download from our GitHub repository: image-recognition-web
